M25 Business Centre

M25 Business Centre providing high quality serviced office space

Case
Study

The M25 Business Centre is a provider of flexible office and workspace for forward-thinking, round-the-clock businesses start-ups and established businesses in Essex.

The M25 Business Centre provides high quality office space and offers tenants a supportive business environment that promotes collaboration and is well connected with off-site business support and professional services.

 

A strategic location with easy access

Based just off the M25 at Waltham Abbey, the M25 Business Centre is in a perfect location for businesses of all sizes with quick access to north, east and central London as well as throughout Essex and Hertfordshire.

“We have a brilliant location – so close to the M25 that you can see the building from the motorway. Companies enjoy being here and we enjoy working with them.”

Paul Zimbler, Managing Director, M25 Business Centre

How the Business Centre began

Paul Zimbler, Managing Director of the M25 Business Centre, developed the 55,000 square foot office complex from August 2013, when it was run down and only housed five companies.  Paul’s concept was to provide a high quality business centre, with serviced offices and to ensure that businesses taking up space also benefitted from a supportive environment and professional services from other providers.

The business centre provides a range of office and meeting room services to start-ups, SMEs and corporates, including…

  • A great office address in Waltham Abbey
  • Flexible agreement terms
  • Simple contract
  • Inclusive monthly billing
  • Furnished offices
  • IT, Internet & Telecoms
  • Staffed reception
  • Call answering
  • Meeting room hire
  • Superfast leased line broadband

Current tenants of the Business Centre

There are now over 70 businesses and 300+ people that work from the M25 Business Centre. Current tenants of the Business Centre include a variety of businesses including a home improvement company, computer accessories companies, care home providers, healthtech companies, various trade organisations, marketing and recruitment agencies.

Commercial growth with INVEST Essex

INVEST Essex worked with the M25 Business Centre with the initial business centre and business support concepts. They continue to work with the Business Centre helping companies relocate and grow.

“The M25 Business Centre is a great asset to the county and shows the power of private business tapping into the expertise of INVEST Essex.”

Cllr Kevin Bentley, Deputy Leader and Cabinet Member for Economic Growth, Infrastructure and Partnerships, Essex County Council

Many businesses have taken advantage of the assistance offered to them by the Inward Investment team at INVEST Essex which has experience of working with businesses of all sizes and have helped many companies relocate in Essex.

Working with partners to provide professional services such as finance and accounting advice, legal services and marketing and branding consultancy, INVEST Essex provides expertise and support to help companies improve effectiveness and profitability.

See here for more information on INVEST Essex.

Biography

With over 25 years’ experience in the Financial Services and Global Relocation industries, Corinne has developed an extensive, specialist, commercial network and has successfully supported projects focused on the strategic development and growth of both overseas and UK companies in business, professional and financial services sectors.
